member.name: M:Microsoft.WindowsAPICodePack.PortableDevices.IPortableDevice.GetDeviceProperty(System.String@,System.Object@,System.Boolean@,Microsoft.WindowsAPICodePack.BlobValueKind@)
member.summary: Returns a property that is specific to the current device model.
member.param: The name of the property for which to get the value.
The default value that is returned if the operation fails.
A value that indicates whether to expand environment variables.
The kind of data that was retrieved.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, the value of the property that was requested are returned; otherwise this method returns .
